description:
Luffy`s turn to fight in the epic colosseum battle draws near, Zoro has an interesting encounter with a surprisingly strong fairy, and the thoughts in Sanji`s head shock his lady captor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All`avventura! Green Bit, l`isola dei folletti
Bouken! Yousei no Shima Green Bit
¡Aventura! La Isla de las Hadas, Green Bit
À l’aventure. Green Bit, l’île des fées !
冒険! 妖精の島グリーンビッ
